service.description: Alluxio Enterprise Edition DC/OS service configuration properties.

name.description: Name of the service instance. If deploying multiple Alluxio clusters, each instance must have a unique service name.

alluxio-distribution.description: Pre-built distribution version: [cdh-5.8, hadoop-1.2, hadoop-2.7, hdp-2.5, mapr-5.2].

log-level.description: Log level for Alluxio console logger.

master-count.description: The number of Alluxio masters. If you plan to have more than one master, enable zookeeper to make Alluxio work in fault tolerant mode.

service-account.description: The service account for DC/OS service authentication. This is typically left empty to use the default unless service authentication is needed. The value given here is passed as the principal of Mesos framework.

service-account-secret.description: Path of the Secret Store credential to use for DC/OS service authentication. This should be left empty unless service authentication is needed.

user.description: The user that runs the Alluxio servers and owns the Mesos sandbox.

worker-count.description: The number of Alluxio workers. Each worker has a co-located job worker used for asynchronous operations.

journal-folder.description: The path to store master journal logs. Default value is ${MESOS_SANDBOX}/alluxio-data if left empty. If fault tolerant mode is enabled, this should point to a location in a shared storage system.

cpus.description: The number of CPU shares allocated to the Alluxio master container.

mem.description: The amount of memory (in MB) allocated to the Alluxio master container.

disk.description: Alluxio master persistent disk requirements (in MB).

disk-type.description: Disk type to be used for storing Alluxio master data: [ROOT, MOUNT].

placement.description: Marathon-style placement constraint controlling node placement for Alluxio masters.

job-cpus.description: The number of CPU shares allocated to the Alluxio job worker container.

job-mem.description: The amount of memory (in MB) allocated to the Alluxio job worker container.

job-disk.description: Alluxio job worker persistent disk requirements (in MB).

job-disk-type.description: Disk type to be used for storing Alluxio job worker data: [ROOT, MOUNT].

job-placement.description: Marathon-style placement constraint controlling node placement for Alluxio job workers.

cpus.description: The number of CPU shares allocated to the Alluxio worker container.

mem.description: The amount of memory (in MB) allocated to the Alluxio worker container.

mem-tier-enabled.description: Whether storage tier on memory is enabled.

mem-ramdisk.description: The amount of memory (in MB) allocated to the worker ramdisk for storing blocks.

disk.description: Alluxio worker persistent disk requirements (in MB).

disk-type.description: Disk type to be used for storing Alluxio worker data: [ROOT, MOUNT].

disk-tier-1-size.description: Disk size for storage tier 1(in MB).

disk-tier-1-type.description: Disk type for storage tier 1: [ROOT, MOUNT].

disk-tier-2-size.description: Disk size for storage tier 2(in MB). Set it to 0 if this tier is not used.

disk-tier-2-type.description: Disk type for storage tier 2: [ROOT, MOUNT].

placement.description: Marathon-style placement constraint controlling node placement for Alluxio workers.

job-cpus.description: The number of CPU shares allocated to the Alluxio job master container.

job-mem.description: The amount of memory (in MB) allocated to the Alluxio job master container.

job-disk.description: Alluxio job master persistent disk requirements (in MB).

job-disk-type.description: Disk type to be used for storing Alluxio job master data: [ROOT, MOUNT].

job-placement.description: Marathon-style placement constraint controlling node placement for Alluxio job masters.

authorization-permission-enabled.description: Whether to enable data path authorization.

keytab-secret.description: Path to base64 encoded keytab secret (format: <service.name>/__dcos_base64__<keytab>). This keytab is used by Alluxio servers.

kerberos-primary.description: The Kerberos primary used by Alluxio servers. The full principal will be <security.kerberos-primary>/<security.kerberos-instance>@<security.kerberos-realm>

kerberos-instance.description: The cluster-wide unified instance name shared by all Alluxio servers.

kerberos-realm.description: The Kerberos realm used to render the principal of Alluxio servers.

krb5-secret.description: Path to krb5.conf secret (format: <service-name>/<krb5-conf>). This path is used by the Alluxio servers to connect to your KDC.

docker.description: Configuration properties for building docker images.

publish-url.description: Docker registry to host any built images (format: test-registry.marathon.mesos:5001)

alluxio-client-base.description: Base docker image to build on

spark-client-base.description: Base docker image to build on

spark-dist-home.description: Spark distribution home in the base docker image

extra-java-opts.description: Java VM options for both Alluxio servers and shell configuration (format: '-Dalluxio.property1=common1 -Dalluxio.property2=common2'; delimiter: ' ' (space)).

extra-client-properties.description: Properties added to client-side alluxio-site.properties (format: 'alluxio.user.file.writetype.default=CACHE_THROUGH alluxio.user.file.readtype.default=NO_CACHE'; delimiter: ' ' (space)).

extra-user-java-opts.description: Java VM options for Alluxio shell configuration (format: '-Dalluxio.property1=shell1 -Dalluxio.property2=shell2'; delimiter: ' ' (space)).

extra-master-java-opts.description: Java VM options for Alluxio master configuration (format: '-Dalluxio.property1=master1 -Dalluxio.property2=master2'; delimiter: ' ' (space)).

extra-worker-java-opts.description: Java VM options for Alluxio worker configuration (format: '-Dalluxio.property1=worker1 -Dalluxio.property2=worker2'; delimiter: ' ' (space)).

extra-job-master-java-opts.description: Java VM options for Alluxio job-aster configuration (format: '-Dalluxio.property1=jmaster1 -Dalluxio.property2=jmaster2'; delimiter: ' ' (space)).

extra-job-worker-java-opts.description: Java VM options for Alluxio job-worker configuration (format: '-Dalluxio.property1=jworker1 -Dalluxio.property2=jworker2'; delimiter: ' ' (space)).

extra-env.description: Environment properties added to client-side alluxio-env.sh (format: 'ALLUXIO_ENV_VAR1=value1 ALLUXIO_ENV_VAR2=value2'; delimiter: ' ' (space))

custom-resources.description: Download custom resources into the sandbox (format: 'DST_PATH1;SOURCE_URL1 DST_PATH2;SOURCE_URL2'). The destination path is relative to the Alluxio home directory (parent of `bin` and `conf`)

master-port.description: The port that Alluxio master node runs on.

master-web-port.description: The port Alluxio web UI runs on.

worker-port.description: The port Alluxio's worker node runs on.

worker-data-port.description: The port Alluxio's worker's data server runs on.

worker-web-port.description: The port Alluxio worker's web UI runs on.

worker-secure-port.description: The port Alluxio worker's secure RPC runs on.

job-master-port.description: The RPC port that Alluxio job-master node runs on.

job-master-web-port.description: The port Alluxio job master web server runs on.

job-worker-port.description: The port Alluxio's job-worker node runs on.

job-worker-data-port.description: The port Alluxio job-worker's data server runs on.

job-worker-web-port.description: The port Alluxio job worker's web server runs on.

job-worker-secure-port.description: The port Alluxio job-worker's secure RPC runs on.

proxy-web-port.description: The port Alluxio proxy server runs on.

hdfs.description: Configuration properties required to setup HDFS UFS.

endpoint.description: URL to download HDFS configuration (hdfs-site.xml, core-site.xml) from (including http header).

root-version.description: The version of HDFS specified for the root UFS (supported: [1.0, 1.2, 2.2, 2.3, 2.4, 2.5, 2.6, 2.7, 2.8, cdh5.6, cdh5.8, cdh5.11, cdh5.12, hdp2.4, hdp2.5, mapr5.2]).

journal-version.description: The version of HDFS specified for the journal.

s3a.description: Configuration properties required to mount an Amazon S3 bucket.

virtual-network.description: Configuration properties to launch in a virtual network

name.description: The name of the virtual network to join

plugin-labels.description: Labels to pass to the virtual network plugin. Comma-separated key:value pairs. For example: k_0:v_0,k_1:v_1,...,k_n:v_n

zookeeper.description: Configuration properties required to setup fault tolerant Alluxio.

enabled.description: If true, setup master fault tolerant mode using ZooKeeper.
